Main pronunciation 主要发音: líng

Other pronunciations 其它发音: lìng,líng

Original meaning 本义: Meaning pass over, cross, traverse.

English senses 英语理解: pure; virtuous; insult; maltreat

Usage example 用法举例: 凌辱 líng rǔ (indignity)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 1833

Shuowen 说文解字: 水在臨淮從水夌聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 淩 from three-dot-water 氵 shuǐ and related phonetic walking-jump 夌 líng (not- 凌 líng). (name- cross-water 淩凌 líng)

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :

淩字的基本解释

淩
líng
奔驰；急行：“冥淩浃行。”
同“凌”②淩③。姓。

淩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［líng］
［《廣韻》力膺切，平蒸，來。］
(1)乘。
(2)越过；超越；升登。
(3)侵犯；欺侮。
(4)冒着。
(5)冰；积冰。
(6)衰落。
(7)纷，杂。参见“淩雜”、“淩亂”。
(8)迫近。参见“淩晨”。
(9)通“”。战栗。
(10)姓。三国吴有淩统。见《三国志·吴志》本传。

淩字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　淩； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页631第01
【唐韻】力膺切【集韻】【韻會】閭承切，?音陵。【博雅】淩馳也。一曰歷也。【木華·海賦】汎海淩山。　又與掕通。【爾雅·釋言】淩，慄也。【註】淩懅戰慄。【疏】?蒼云：掕慄也。郭言淩懅戰慄，則淩掕音義同。　又水名。【前漢·地理志】泗水郡淩縣。【應劭曰】淩水所出。　又姓。【三國志】吳淩統。　與凌別。

河名。

Ling
Basic explanation of words
Ling
líng
Mercedes-Benz; Hurry: "Ming Lingxianxing."
Same as "Ling"②Ling③. name.
Ling
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［líng］
["Guangyun" forcefully cut, steamed, come. ]
(1) Multiply.
(2) Overstep; overtake; ascend.
(3) Violation; bullying.
(4) Braving.
(5) Ice; ice accumulation.
(6) Decline.
(7) Various and miscellaneous. See also "messy", "messy".
(8) Approaching. See "Early Morning".
(9) Pass "". Trembling.
(10) Last name. Three Kingdoms Wu has Ling Tong. See the biography of "Three Kingdoms·Wu Zhi".
Ling
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　 Ling; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: Page 631 01
[Tang Yun] Forced to cut [Jiyun] [Rhyme] Lu Chengqi,? Yinling. [Bo Ya] Ling Chi also. One is also the calendar. [Muhua·Haifu] Fanhai Lingshan.　Connect with each other again. 【Erya·Interpretation】Ling, Li Ye. [Note] Ling Yan shuddered. [Sparse]? Cang Yun: Chi Li also. Guo Yan Ling trembles, and Ling Yi has the same sound and meaning.　Also known as water. [Former Han Geography] Ling County, Sishui County. [Ying Shao said] Ling Shui came out.　Another last name. [Three Kingdoms] Wu Lingtong.　Farewell to Ling.
Ling

Ling
Name meaning
The name of the river.
líng
I гл.
1) вм. 凌 (проходить через, переезжать, пересекать, переваливать через, преодолевать)
2) вм. 凌 (уноситься ввысь, воспарять; подниматься над)
3) вм. 凌 (оскорблять; притеснять)
II собств.
1) геогр. (сокр. вм. 淩水) Линшуй (река в пров. Цзянсу)
2) Лин (фамилия)
